amathyansha lekamwaraya ohuge amathyawaraya bharaye athi aanduwe departhamenthu da, wenath aayathana da meheyawiya yuththe siya amathyawarayage widhanayata ha palanayata yatathwaya yanna sandahan aandukrama wyawasthawe 52 (2) waganthiya sambandhayen karunu wimasu awasthawe janadhipathi nithignya prasantha lal da alwis kiya sitiye me awasthawe amathi mandalayak nomathi bawin, adala amathyanshaya bhara amathiwaraya washayen nowa widhayakaye pradhaniya washayen ohuta lekamwarun margayen adala amathyansha palanaya kala haki bawaya.

me athara sanrakshana paryeshana aayathanaye sabhapathi aacharya pruthuwiraj pranandu bibisi sinhala sewaya wetha adahas dakwamin kiya sitiye udyanawalin pitatha sarisarana aliathun aaraksha kara ganima sambandhayen baladharinta menma janathawata da wagakimak pawarena bawaya.
ikbithi aalawaka yakshathema bhagyawathun wahanseta gathayen kiya:
ee lipiye wadi­du­ra­tath mese sanda­hanwa atha: “mage dema­pi­yan dikka­sada wu nisa mama kadunu bhanda­yak wuna.
ee siddhiya kamarawata nangime di nikuth wu aaloka dhara nisa biyata path buwalla eya atha hara ekwarama panala giya.

ewani manushika guna gahana ape soldaduwan ithihasaya thula nidos kota nidahas kirimata me aanduwa ki්raya nokirima wirodhara yudawiruwanta karana aparadhayaki. 1988-89 athara, samahara siddhin pawa me wanawita adhikaranaya hamuwe yukthiya wisandemin pawathi.

wana sathwa ha thurulatha aaraksha kirime aagnyapanatha anuwa mewani aparadhayakata wagakiwayuththan rupiyal laksha paha dakwa dadayakata lakkirimata ho wasara deke sita paha dakwa sira danduwamakata lakkirime hakiyawa athi bawin wana alin athulu wana sathun sandaha adala pupurana drawya bhawithayen walaki sitina lesada wanajiwi sanrakshana departhamenthuwa janathawata danum deyi.

ee anuwa anuyatha warshawala siduwu wahana aananaya mehi dakwa atha.
purathana demala sahithya kruthiyak wana bhagawatha puranaye ha wenath purana kathawala indiyanu sagaraye pihiti lemuriya nohoth kumari kandam namin handinwena sithiyamak pilibandawa sandahan we.
ooka api katawath eka paratama therum ganna bariwa ape ewunuth eka ekage muna balagaththa.
oonama asabhya deyak narambaa ee anuwa hisa sakasaganna yauwanaya thamage aasha itukara ganima udesa oonama ayaku yoda ganimata nopasubata wanne me nisaya.

mage athdakim oonawtath wadiyi mewa kiyanna.
